summary: This is an email forwarding remarks for a press conference regarding the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email suggests the remarks are for review and potential use by the recipient, who appears to be associated with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the indictment press conference remarks being forwarded in the email.

events.title: Forwarding of Press Conference Remarks
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a document titled 'Ghislaine Maxwell Indictment Press Conference Remarks.docx' for review and potential use.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 26, 2020, forwarding prepared remarks for a Ghislaine Maxwell indictment press conference.
The email is sent to or from an address associated with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The sender offers the remarks for the recipient's use, stating 'If you feel like any of this is useful, feel free to use it. If you think it's dumb, disregard.'
